summary: "Inside No. 9" is a British TV show created by Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith. It aired on BBC Two from 2014 to 2024, with 9 series and 55 episodes. Each 30-minute episode is a separate story with new characters and settings, usually starring Pemberton and Shearsmith. The stories are linked by a theme related to the number 9 and a hidden brass hare statue. The show mixes comedy and horror with unexpected plot twists. Critics love it for its creativity and humor. In 2024, it was announced that the show will be adapted into a West End stage play, "Inside No. 9 Stage/Fright," premiering in 2025.
title: Inside No. 9
